application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Back Garden (Left Boundary) T1: Cherry tree - Reduce height by 2 - 2.5 metres, remove ivy down to ground level, remove major deadwood height 8m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 6m & spread to 5mT2: Pear tree - Reduce height by 2 metres, remove major deadwood height 7m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 3m & spread to 3mT3: Holm oak tree - Reduce height by 2.5 metres, thin canopy by 5%, remove major deadwood height 8m & spread 5m. Reduce height to 6m & spread to 4m(Right Boundary) T4: Thuja tree - Trim tight to shape (all sides) Height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5.5m & spread to 4.8mT5: Yew tree - Trim tight to shape (all sides) Height 6m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5.5m & spread to 4.8mT6: Bay tree - Reduce height by 3 metres, trim tight to shape (all sides) Height 8m & spread 4m. Reduce height to 5m & spread to 4.8mReason for work: More light, maintaining this tree in its current setting
decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T2
Works agreed to tree labelled T6
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T3
